metadata.title: CVE-2022-46882 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A use-after-free in WebGL extensions could have led to a potentiallyexploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 107, Firefox ESR <102.6, and Thunderbird < 102.6.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-46882` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

thunderbird - 1:102.7.1+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:102.7.1+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:102.7.1+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:102.7.1+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:102.7.1+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:102.7.1+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:102.7.1+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
